entry.title: Branch Side Table
entry.summary:
Vendor: Norm Architects
Type: Side Table
Price: 535.00 - 605.00 (2 variants)

Whether used as an occasional table or a temporary workstation, the height adjustable Branch Side Table adapts to changing needs, offering a versatile and seamless solution for dynamic living spaces. Its compact and flexible design allows it to be conveniently pushed close to a sofa or chair, optimising space, while its black steel base and charcoal linoleum or dark-stained oak tabletop add a touch of sophistication in a quality that ensures it withstands the demands of daily use.

entry.title: Volume Side Table
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ted Synnott
Type: Side Table
Price: 575.00

The Volume Side Table introduces a fresh approach to contemporary furniture that stands out in any setting. Crafted from aluminium, it boasts a sleek and modern appearance with curved lines offsetting straight lines to create a balanced look. The polishing process on the metal enhances its visual appeal, giving the table a unique sheen that adds character. The lacquer-protected surface ensures low maintenance, making it easy to clean and maintain the side table's sleek appearance with minimal effort whether used indoors or outdoors.

entry.title: Corbel Shelf, Large
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kroyer-Saetter-Lassen
Type: Wall Shelf
Price: 390.00 - 535.00 (2 variants)

The Corbel Shelf takes its name and design cues from architectural weight-bearing brackets traditionally made from stone or wood. Designed for versatility, it serves a range of different purposes and needs in dining, kitchen and living room areas, maximising the utility of a space and infusing the design with a sense of structural elegance. The shelf can also be paired with the corresponding desk to create a minimalist home office. thoughtfully crafted to maintain a clean and decluttered aesthetic. The small distance to the wall allows for neat cord management. The wall-mounted design is offered in marble or dark-stained oak with dark-stained oak and bronzed steel brackets, catering to different interior styles and preferences.

entry.title: Androgyne Side Table, Steel Base
entry.summary:
Vendor: Danielle Siggerud
Type: Side Table
Price: 470.00

With its contemporary elegance and minimalist appeal, the Androgyne Side Table becomes more than just furniture—it becomes a statement piece that enhances the overall aesthetic of any space. Crafted from stainless steel, renowned for its durability and corrosion resistance, the brushed finish introduces an intriguing texture to the metal, creating an interplay of light and shadow that make the design a focal point in any room. The collection’s tabletop, offered in a range of materials, can be added to the design.

Please note, a tabletop can be purchased separately. Find it here.

entry.title: Passage Stool, Upholstered
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kroyer-Saetter-Lassen
Type: Chair
Price: 590.00 - 940.00 (6 variants)

The Passage Collection demonstrates meticulous attention to detail, highlighting a commitment to both comfort and aesthetics rooted in traditional woodworking techniques. In solid, lacquered walnut or FSC™-certified solid oak, the stackable stool presents unique grain patterns inherent to the high-quality hardwoods and a warm and inviting expression. With its upholstered seat, offered in customisable fabric options for a personal touch, the small but perfectly formed design provides a comfortable seating experience for extended periods.

entry.title: Brasilia Ottoman
entry.summary:
Vendor: Anderssen & Voll
Type: Lounge Chair
Price: 765.00 - 1410.00 (14 variants)

Designed for Audo by Anderssen & Voll, Brasilia Ottoman is distinguished by its robust, cylindrical legs and softly curved cushion. Informed by mid-20th century Danish craftsmanship and Brazilian Modernism, the versatile design has lasting appeal – as a footrest with the accompanying chair, as a low-lying seat for unexpected guests, or as a resting place for a newspaper or tray. Available in three wood options and a range of soft fabrics from our extensive range, it can be tailored to use anywhere.

entry.title: Brasilia Lounge Chair, Textile
entry.summary:
Vendor: Anderssen & Voll
Type: Lounge Chair
Price: 2135.00 - 4415.00 (10 variants)

Scandinavian mid-century design aesthetics and Brazilian Modernism meet on the low-lying Brasilia Lounge Chair, designed for Audo by Anderssen & Voll. The luxurious armchair-lounge chair hybrid offers unparalleled sitting comfort thanks to its robust frame and soft upholstery. Characterised by its stout and sturdy legs, made using traditional joinery techniques, and exaggerated armrests and cushioning seat and backrest, upholstered in a range of soft fabrics, it creates a sense of comfort and ease in any setting.

entry.title: Co Lounge, fully upholstered
entry.summary:
Vendor: Norm Architects & Els van Hoorebeeck
Type: Lounge Chair
Price: 1100.00 - 1380.00 (11 variants)

Profiling a more laid-back look than its dining counterparts, the comfortable Co Lounge Chair, designed for Audo by Norm Architects and Els Van Hoorebeeck, features curved armrests and an upholstered seat and backrest angled to support and embrace the body. The slender yet strong powder coated steel base lends a feeling of lightness to the design.

entry.title: Co Lounge Chair
entry.summary:
Vendor: Norm Architects & Els van Hoorebeeck
Type: Lounge Chair
Price: 885.00 - 1100.00 (11 variants)

Our Co Chair Collection proves that comfort doesn't have to come at the cost of beauty. Equal parts elegance and ease, its graceful minimal, modern frame and supportive, angled backrest make sitting a pleasure — for how ever long it lasts. The new Co Lounge Chair continues the collection's legacy, combining steel, woodworking and upholstering skills and unexpected comfort to create an iconic chair for relaxation that fits seamlessly into any setting.

Co Lounge Chair is a new and lightweight lounger with exceptional sitting comfort. Inspired by classic designs that combine metalwork and woodwork to iconic effect, the new iteration purposefully re-spaces its different components to create a lighter, more laid-back look than its dining predecessor. The comfortable design enhances interior spaces rather than demanding attention in a room. The form-pressed wood veneer backrest is angled for comfort and the curved armrests and upholstered seat support and embrace the body. The slender powder-coated steel frame belies its strength, providing a stable and sleek foundation on which to stand. Fully customizable, it melds beautifully with its surroundings – whether at home in a cosy living room corner or placed in a hotel lobby or office reception.

entry.title: Kubus 8, White
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mogens Lassen
Type: Candle Holder
Price: 320.00

Mogens Lassen designed the very first Kubus candle holder in 1962 for the interior of a restaurant in northern Zealand, Denmark. The geometric candleholder series has since become a much-loved icon of Danish design thanks to its timeless, Modernist form and enduring function. Kubus 8 is a mood-enhancing addition to any space. With room for eight candles it creates a cosy atmosphere wherever it is placed. It is available in a range of metals and finishes.

entry.title: Frame, 42
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mogens Lassen
Type:
Price: 295.00 - 445.00 (14 variants)

Frame 42 is a flexible storage solution consisting of a square module in a cubistic frame. The simple storage system is inspired by the Kubus candleholder by Mogens Lassen, based on strict mathematical formulas and designed with the greatest precision. This variant is a classic Frame 42 module without doors and shelves.

s:variant.title: Open Module / Frame - Black Stained Ash
With Door / Frame - Black Stained Ash

entry.title: Knitting Lounge Chair, Sheepskin
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ib Kofod-Larsen
Type: Lounge Chair
Price: 4270.00 - 4765.00 (3 variants)

First launched as a limited edition in 1951, Ib Kofod-Larsen’s Knitting Chair is reimagined with a natural oak, dark stained oak, and walnut frame. The distinctive piece is meticulously handcrafted in Sweden by skilled artisans, merging traditional craftsmanship techniques with modern technology to create an unforgettable and timeless design of the highest quality.

entry.title: Spire Smooth Tapered Candles, Set of 6
entry.summary:
Vendor: Audo Copenhagen
Type: Candle
Price: 36.00

Elegant and ambient, the Spire Candle is a new take on the classic votive, elevating any setting with its elongated, tapered form. Made with consideration from plant-based wax and available in a set of six, the unscented design is offered in three different colourways: neutral, warm and cool.

entry.title: Eave Modular Sofa, 96, Corner 192
entry.summary:
Vendor: Norm Architects
Type: Sofa
Price: 2550.00 - 3370.00 (20 variants)

Allowing for total customisation of living and lounging spaces, the Eave Modular Sofa comes in a wide variety of seating modules as well as preconfigured designs. A fusion of timeless style and sumptuous comfort, the upholstered designs feature deep seats and curved backrests.

Allowing for longer and larger configurations, this corner sofa module with double width offers extra room for reclining and sitting.

Available in a range of textile upholstery from our collection, as well as bespoke options.

Explore combination ideas here.

Vendor: Norm Architects

Price: 2240.00 - 3060.00 (20 variants)

Allowing for total customisation of living and lounging spaces, the Eave Modular Sofa comes in a wide variety of seating modules as well as preconfigured designs. A fusion of timeless style and sumptuous comfort, the upholstered designs feature deep seats and curved backrests.

Adaptable to different environments and interior design styles, this corner sofa module is shaped with the collection’s characteristic curves for comfort and support when sitting and offers extra seat width.

Available in a range of textile upholstery from our collection, as well as bespoke options.

Price: 2105.00 - 2910.00 (20 variants)

Allowing for total customisation of living and lounging spaces, the Eave Modular Sofa comes in a wide variety of seating modules as well as preconfigured designs. A fusion of timeless style and sumptuous comfort, the upholstered designs feature deep seats and curved backrests.

Characteristically shaped with a curved backrest and an open end for easy access and extra space for lounging, this sofa module fits seamlessly together with others from the collection.

entry.title: Eave Modular Sofa, 96, Chaise Longue
entry.summary:
Vendor: Norm Architects
Type: Sofa
Price: 2105.00 - 2910.00 (20 variants)

Allowing for total customisation of living and lounging spaces, the Eave Modular Sofa comes in a wide variety of seating modules as well as preconfigured designs. A fusion of timeless style and sumptuous comfort, the upholstered designs feature deep seats and curved backrests.

A shorter design ideal for more compact spaces, this chaise longue module features extra deep seats for comfort and the collection’s characteristic curves.

Available in a range of textile upholstery from our collection, as well as bespoke options.

Explore combination ideas here.

entry.title: Eave Modular Sofa, 96, 3-seater, Configurations 11-12
entry.summary:
Vendor: Norm Architects
Type: Sofa
Price: 5335.00 - 7635.00 (20 variants)

Inspired by architecture Eave Modular Sofa takes its name from “eaves” – the lower edges of the roof that overhang a wall. The sofa’s distinctive detail is its internal “eaves” – curved upholstered armrests that lend the sofa its expressive character.

A modular sofa designed with comfort and ease in mind, this configuration offers both space to sit and recline thanks to its thoughtful combination of chaise longue, corner and open section modules with down-filled seats and curved backrests.

Be inspired to create your own combinations here.
